en.title: [Oct 2024] Industrial Production Index
en.description: Monthly industrial production indices for the manufacturing, mining, and electricity production sectors.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest monthly Industrial Production Index, including breakdowns for the manufacturing, mining, and electricity production sectors.

bm.title: [Okt 2024] Indeks Pengeluaran Perinudstrian
bm.description: Indeks pengeluaran perindustrian bulanan bagi sektor pembuatan, pelombongan dan penjanaan elektrik.
bm.description_email: DOSM baru sahaja menerbitkan Indeks Pengeluaran Perindustrian bulanan terkini, termasuk perincian bagi sektor pembuatan, pelombongan dan penjanaan elektrik.
